Text: The graphics in this game screw-up badly for me, ie textures stretching across the screen and meshes disappearing :( seems it doesn't like my ATI card.
go to the options-menu, video or screen settings, and de-activate "texture compressing" , that should fix your problem!....
btw. i do have ati as well (x600-lame card) !!!
HEy Subzero ! Would you please Rip PES 08 ?

There is a badly grey thing on the screen,when you have start the game...you should fix it here:
options->video->subtietles-> (turn it to off or no)
 The problem is fixed...good luck!

System requirements:
#Windows 98,98SE,2000,ME,XP (maby on a really good win95)
#Intel Pentium II 400 mhz, AMD 400
#64 mb ram
#3d card with 16 mb free memory
# 800 mb- 1 gb harddrive space
#mouse and keyboard
If I can get this downloaded I will seed all night, please seed.
The graphics in this game screw-up badly for me! Why?

to vidgrim:

you i think you have a grey thing on the screen...to take of that , do like this:

1 start the game
2 go to options
3 go to video
4 go to subtitles
5 turn that to off
6 go back to video setting and check that you have this setting active:
 Bilinear filtering (yes)
 Detal Textures (yes)
 Decals (yes)
 Mipmap detail (medium or high)
7 go back to the game
8 talk to the peceptionist and go to the elevator
9 go up to the party and the scrren problem is out!   Good Luck!
It didn't helped... The characters is screw-up.

Works fine! 
I had no errors while installing, or while playing.
No viruses(NOD32)
Thanks
